scripts.build-with-css: npm run export-css && vite build && rm -f dist/assets/index-*.css && sed -i 's|<link rel="stylesheet" crossorigin href="\./assets/index-[^"]*\.css">||g' dist/*.html && sass sass/style.scss:dist/assets/style.css --style=expanded --no-source-map
scripts.build-all: npm run build-with-css && cp location.html dist/
